fullText: This aggressively upbeat musical about a sex strike staged by the girlfriends of a losing basketball team never finds the right tone for its ancient source material.
dtliExcerpt: This aggressively upbeat musical about a sex strike staged by the girlfriends of a losing basketball team never finds the right tone for its ancient source material.
bwwExcerpt: “Lysistrata Jones” has been dressed up (and scaled up) real pretty for Broadway, bringing a heightened touch of summer sun and silliness to what has been an exceptionally gray season for musicals...Lysistrata may at first seem deeply superficial. But it turns out there’s tasty substance beneath the froth, just enough to keep you hooked. The same may be said of the endearingly escapist show in which she appears.
